did.head: Descriptive Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University

did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult the Library's online catalog.
did.abstract: Collection contains bus schedules, plans, memoranda, newsletters. reports, inventories, appraisals and other materials concerning University buildings, property, and facilities. Subjects include the oceanographic research vessel "Eastward," energy conservation efforts, repairs and rennovations to facilities, the heating plant, and the Duke Quarry.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Researchers must register and agree to copyright and privacy laws before using this collection.
All or portions of this collection may be housed off-site in Duke University's Library Service Center. The library may require up to 48 hours to retrieve these materials for research use.
Please contact Research Services staff before visiting the University Archives to use this collection.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright for Official University records is held by Duke University; all other copyright is retained by the authors of items in these papers, or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], in the Physical Plant Department records, 1960-1984, Duke University Archives, David M. Rubenstein Rare Book & Manuscript Library, Duke University.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Finding aid derived from MARC record, November 2014

bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: The Physical Plant Department was created between 1970/1971 and 1971/1972. It supplanted the Plant Engineering Department, which had replaced the Operations and Maintenance Department in the 1960s. The Physical Plant Department itself was supplanted Oct. 1987 by the Facilities Planning and Physical Plant Department.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Collection contains bus schedules, plans, memoranda, newsletters. reports, inventories, appraisals and other materials concerning University buildings, property, and facilities. Subjects include the oceanographic research vessel "Eastward," energy conservation efforts, repairs and rennovations to facilities, the heating plant, and the Duke Quarry.

note.label: General note
note.p: Unprocessed collection. Cataloged from accession records.
